https://twitterapi.io/blog/twitter-api-p.title: X (Twitter) Official API Pricing Tiers 2025
https://twitterapi.io/blog/twitter-api-p.info: Comprehensive pricing tiers for Twitter/X API in 2025: Free (100 posts/month), Basic ($200/month, 15k reads), Pro ($5,000/month, 1M reads), Enterprise (custom pricing). Alternative TwitterAPI.io offers pay-per-use at $0.15 per 1,000 tweets.

https://docs.x.com/x-api/introduction.title: X API v2 Introduction
https://docs.x.com/x-api/introduction.info: Official X API v2 documentation detailing access levels, rate limits, and features. Free tier includes 1 project, 100 posts/month reads, 500 posts/month writes. Basic tier at $200/month includes full v2 endpoints.

https://lunarcrush.com/pricing.title: LunarCrush Social Analytics Pricing
https://lunarcrush.com/pricing.info: LunarCrush pricing: Individual ($72/month), Builder ($240/month), Scale ($720/month), Enterprise (custom). Includes social sentiment analysis, AI agents, custom terms, and API access with rate limits.

https://www.stockgeist.ai/api-pricing/.title: API Pricing StockGeist
https://www.stockgeist.ai/api-pricing/.info: StockGeist AI sentiment API pricing: Free tier includes 10k monthly credits, 1 crypto stream, 5 stock streams. Paid plans range from $75-$2500 with 75-100 streams for crypto and stock data.

https://sentimentracker.com/.title: Momentum Radar Social Sentiment
https://sentimentracker.com/.info: SentimentTracker and Momentum Radar pricing: High tier ($149/month, $349/3 months, $999/year), Low tier ($24.95/month, $49.95/3 months, $199/year). Features include social sentiment tracking and trending analysis.

https://app.santiment.net/social-trends.title: Santiment Social Trends
https://app.santiment.net/social-trends.info: Santiment provides crypto sentiment analysis with social trends tracking, trending words, stories, and coins. Price not specified but includes community analysis and insights.

https://alpaca.markets/learn/reddit-sent.title: Reddit Sentiment Analysis Strategy
https://alpaca.markets/learn/reddit-sent.info: Guide to Reddit sentiment analysis using Alpaca Trading API with Python, NLTK for sentiment analysis, and PRAW for Reddit data extraction. Focuses on Ethereum subreddit analysis for crypto trading.

https://assemblyai.com/blog/best-apis-fo.title: Best APIs for Sentiment Analysis 2025
https://assemblyai.com/blog/best-apis-fo.info: Comparison of sentiment analysis APIs including AssemblyAI (focus on audio/video), Twinword (free 9k words/month), IBM Watson, Amazon Comprehend, and Google AI. Pricing ranges from $19-250/month.

https://www.coingecko.com/learn/crypto-s.title: Crypto Sentiment Analysis Trading Strategy
https://www.coingecko.com/learn/crypto-s.info: Guide to crypto sentiment analysis strategy using CoinGecko API (free tier: 30 calls/minute, 10k monthly calls) combined with external sentiment analysis tools for trading signals.

https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/master.title: Discord API Guide for Crypto Communities
https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/master.info: Comprehensive guide to Discord API integration for crypto sentiment analysis. Covers Gateway vs REST, authentication, rate limits, webhooks, and AI integration for real-time community monitoring.

https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/top-cr.title: Top Crypto Narratives 2024
https://www.tokenmetrics.com/blog/top-cr.info: Analysis of top crypto narratives in 2024 including DePIN (30.2%), AI (18.8%), GameFi (14.4%), DeFi (13.2%), RWA (8.6%), with methodology for narrative detection and trend analysis.

https://www.creolestudios.com/ai-agents-.title: AI Agents for Crypto Trading Free vs Paid
https://www.creolestudios.com/ai-agents-.info: Comparison of free vs paid AI crypto tools. Quadency ranges $49-199/month with AI features including sentiment analysis. Free tools typically have limited features and accuracy.

https://etherscan.io/apis.title: Etherscan APIs - Ethereum (ETH) API Provider
https://etherscan.io/apis.info: Etherscan API V2 menyediakan akses terpadu ke data EVM di 50+ blockchain dengan rate limits hingga 30 calls/second, support untuk enterprise dengan unlimited access, pricing mulai dari free tier hingga $899/month

https://docs.github.com/en/rest/using-th.title: Rate limits for the REST API - GitHub Docs
https://docs.github.com/en/rest/using-th.info: GitHub API rate limits: 60 req/hour untuk unauthenticated, 5000 req/hour untuk authenticated users, dengan dukungan GitHub Enterprise Cloud hingga 15000 req/hour

https://moralis.com/api/wallet/.title: Crypto Wallet API for Web3 Dapps
https://moralis.com/api/wallet/.info: Moralis Wallet API mendukung 30+ blockchain, mencakup 500+ juta alamat Web3, dengan fitur real-time tracking menggunakan Moralis Streams, pricing enterprise dengan SOC 2 compliance

https://docs.gitlab.com/user/project/int.title: Webhooks - GitLab Docs
https://docs.gitlab.com/user/project/int.info: GitLab Webhooks support real-time notifications, dengan fitur custom headers, template webhook, filter by branch, dan automatic disabling untuk failed webhooks

https://dune.com/product/api.title: Dune API
https://dune.com/product/api.info: Dune Analytics API menyediakan akses ke 1+ PB data multi-chain dengan REST API Sinkron, MCP-ready untuk AI integration, dan support untuk 100+ blockchains

https://api-docs.defillama.com/.title: API Docs - DefiLlama
https://api-docs.defillama.com/.info: DeFiLlama API memiliki kategori Developer Activity Tracking (DAT), versi Pro pricing $300/month dengan higher rate limits dan endpoint untuk TVL, stablecoins, dan blockchain analytics

https://npmtrends.com/.title: npm trends: Compare NPM package downloads
https://npmtrends.com/.info: npm-trends.com menyediakan fungsionalitas untuk membandingkan jumlah unduhan paket NPM dari waktu ke waktu, berguna untuk tracking package popularity

https://docs.github.com/en/webhooks/webh.title: Webhook events and payloads - GitHub Docs
https://docs.github.com/en/webhooks/webh.info: GitHub Webhooks support berbagai events dengan payload JSON, ada 25MB payload cap, dengan security headers untuk validasi seperti X-Hub-Signature-256

https://docs.gitlab.com/api/events/.title: Events API - GitLab Docs
https://docs.gitlab.com/api/events/.info: GitLab Events API digunakan untuk review aktivitas event, mencakup berbagai actions seperti joining projects, commenting on issues, pushing changes

https://circleci.com/docs/api/v2/.title: CircleCI API v2 Documentation
https://circleci.com/docs/api/v2/.info: CircleCI API v2 menyediakan insights endpoints dengan metrik real-time pipeline, usage tracking dengan 13 bulan data retention, dan rate limits 10 requests/hour per organization

https://sentry.io/.title: Sentry: Application Performance Monitoring & Error Tracking Software
https://sentry.io/.info: Sentry menyediakan real-time error tracking dengan 4+ juta developers, 150,000+ teams, dengan integrasi GitHub/Jira/Slack dan comprehensive API untuk developer activity monitoring

https://docs.github.com/en/rest/code-sca.title: REST API endpoints for code scanning - GitHub Docs
https://docs.github.com/en/rest/code-sca.info: GitHub Code Scanning API menyediakan endpoints untuk mengambil alerts, mengelola autofix, upload SARIF data, dan tracking CodeQL database untuk security analysis

https://docs.sourcegraph.com/admin/analy.title: Sourcegraph Analytics
https://docs.sourcegraph.com/admin/analy.info: Sourcegraph Analytics menawarkan comprehensive tracking untuk 500+ juta developers dengan metrics seperti code completion rate, AI coding assistance, dan real-time code intelligence analytics

https://docs.coingecko.com/.title: CoinGecko API - Comprehensive Crypto Market Data
https://docs.coingecko.com/.info: API terpopuler dengan 18K+ koin, 1K+ exchange, support 250+ blockchain, rate limits 30-1000 calls/min, pricing dari gratis hingga enterprise

https://coinmarketcap.com/api/documentat.title: CoinMarketCap API Documentation
https://coinmarketcap.com/api/documentat.info: API established dengan 93 mata uang fiat support, rate limits per tier, endpoint kategoris, pricing dari gratis Basic hingga Enterprise

https://docs.binance.us/.title: Binance US API Documentation
https://docs.binance.us/.info: Comprehensive trading API dengan REST & WebSocket, rate limits berbasis request weight, no API usage fees, fokus pada data pasar real-time

https://docs.etherscan.io/etherscan-v2.title: Etherscan API V2 - Multichain Access
https://docs.etherscan.io/etherscan-v2.info: Multichain EVM API dengan 60+ supported chains, PRO endpoints, comprehensive on-chain data untuk blockchain analysis

https://www.alchemy.com/docs/data.title: Alchemy Data APIs Overview
https://www.alchemy.com/docs/data.info: Blockchain development platform dengan API data komprehensif, Portfolio API, Token API, NFT API, real-time pricing, multi-chain support

https://www.infura.io/.title: Infura Web3 Development Platform
https://www.infura.io/.info: RPC provider dengan 40+ networks, pricing tiers dari Core (3M credits/day) hingga Enterprise, guaranteed throughput rates

https://whale-alert.io/.title: Whale Alert - Real-Time Crypto Whale Tracking
https://whale-alert.io/.info: Whale tracking dengan hampir 100 crypto assets, real-time monitoring, 1000 alerts/day, pricing mulai $14.95/month

https://cryptoquant.com/.title: CryptoQuant - On-Chain Actionable Insights

https://bitquery.io/blog/how-to-find-eth.title: Bitquery - Ethereum Whale Tracking Guide
https://bitquery.io/blog/how-to-find-eth.info: GraphQL API untuk whale tracking dan blockchain analysis, support 40+ blockchain, real-time data untuk smart money movement

https://www.alchemy.com/pricing.title: Alchemy API Pricing Plans
https://www.alchemy.com/pricing.info: Pricing transparan: Free (30M CU/month), Pay-as-you-go ($0.40/1M CU), Enterprise (kustom), 25-300+ req/s rate limits

https://www.infura.io/pricing.title: Infura API Pricing
https://www.infura.io/pricing.info: Pricing tiers: Core (gratis 3M credits/day), Developer ($50/month 15M credits/day), Team ($225/month 75M credits/day)

https://www.coingecko.com/en/api/pricing.title: CoinGecko API Pricing Plans
